xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/569606-Crime Survival: Jim Wagner's Reality-Based Personal Protection 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/baf4p0V11QtG2l8mRTX6YI4F2UB.jpg In a dangerous world, it's important to know how to defend yourself. This instructional program features techniques for thwarting a carjacking, chemical attack, armed robbery, gang violence and other assaults. Host Jim Wagner brings more than 20 years' experience in military, law enforcement and SWAT team security to his self-described Reality-Based Personal Protection system, designed to protect the average citizen. Crime Survival: Jim Wagner's Reality-Based Personal Protection
